EmailTemplate.subject: Hello {!Contact.FirstName} , Here Is A Consumption Activity Tracker For Your Customers Homes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName} ,
My name is Bryan Hoffman and I work locally at Palmetto a clean technology company in Charleston. We understand that energy savings are a top priority to your customers when they are purchasing a new HVAC system.
This is why we've created Palmetto Home, a technology product that allows your customers to track their home's energy consumption down to an individual circuit within the home...or in this case their HVAC system.
Palmetto Home allows you to... - Show your customers the real time savings from their HVAC system - Show customers the benefits of a maintenance contract with you - Communicate directly to your customers in order to better meet their service needs - Mange electrical consumption, rather than accepting it as a fixed cost - Gain actionable insights on how to improve their existing system
I would love to setup a time to show you the Palmetto Home app in order to provide you with a visual image of what your customers would be interacting with on a daily basis.
Thank You,
{!User.Name} Palmetto Clean Energy Technology Team bryan.hoffman@palmetto.com Office: 843-720-1844 www.Palmetto.com
